content: Hi, I believe I have received a high enough grade between the first two microquizzes so I do not need to take Microquiz 3. Can I take the third microquiz remotely for practice, or would you prefer anyone attempting the problems to do them in person?
subject: Taking Microquiz 3 Remotely

content: If you are accessing the exam, we require you to join the class in-person. Thanks for checking.
